Module Alchemy::Controller::InstanceMethods
In: lib/alchemy/controller.rb

Methods

alchemy_plugin   alchemy_plugins   plugin_conf  

Public Instance methods

alchemy_plugin(name)

returns the alchemy plugin found by name, or by hash of controller and action

[Source]

    # File lib/alchemy/controller.rb, line 71
71:       def alchemy_plugin(name)
72:         if name.is_a? String
73:           alchemy_plugins.detect{ |p| p["name"] == name }
74:         elsif name.is_a? Hash
75:           alchemy_plugins.detect do |p| 
76:             if !p["navigation"]["sub_navigation"].nil?
77:               p["navigation"]["sub_navigation"].detect do |s| 
78:                 s["controller"] == name[:controller] && s["action"] == name[:action]
79:               end
80:             end
81:           end
82:         end
83:       end
alchemy_plugins()

returns an array with all alchemy plugins including the alchemy core as first entry. For your own plugin see config.yml in vendor/plugins/alchemy/config/alchemy folder

[Source]

    # File lib/alchemy/controller.rb, line 44
44:       def alchemy_plugins
45:         ymls = plugins_config_ymls
46:         plugins = []
47:         alchemy_config = ymls.detect { |c| c.include?('vendor/plugins/alchemy') }
48:         alchemy_config_yml = YAML.load_file(alchemy_config)
49:         if alchemy_config_yml
50:           alchemy_plugins = alchemy_config_yml["alchemy_plugins"]
51:           plugins += alchemy_plugins
52:         end
53:         ymls.delete(alchemy_config)
54:         begin
55:           ymls = ymls.sort(){ |x, y| YAML.load_file(x)['order'] <=> YAML.load_file(y)['order'] }
56:         rescue Exception => e
57:           Rails.logger.error(%(
58:             ++++++
59:             No order value in one of your plugins. Please check plugins
60:             ++++++
61:           ))
62:         end
63:         ymls.each do |y|
64:           plugin = YAML.load_file(y)
65:           plugins << plugin
66:         end
67:         return plugins
68:       end
